ISSUE.TITLE: Configure ruff to validate against Python 3.10+
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Set ruff's [`target-version`](https://docs.astral.sh/ruff/settings/#target-version) to Python 3.10. ### Justification Python 3.10 is the minimum supported by NetBox.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #19046 from pheus/docs/18733-add-version-requirements-matrix Fixes #18733: Add Dependency Version Matrix for NetBox Versions to the Upgrade Documentation

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19112: Configure ruff to target Python 3.10
